items.title: OpenAI says it does not think Anthropic should be designated as a supply chain risk and it has made its position on this clear to the Pentagon (@openai)
items.title_en: OpenAI says it does not think Anthropic should be designated as a supply chain risk and it has made its position on this clear to the Pentagon (@openai)
items.title_zh: OpenAI 表示，它认为不应将 Anthropic 指定为供应链风险，并且已向五角大楼明确表明了自己的立场 (@openai)

items.title: OpenAI says its DOD agreement upholds its redlines and "has more guardrails than any previous agreement for classified AI deployments, including Anthropic's" (OpenAI)
items.title_en: OpenAI says its DOD agreement upholds its redlines and "has more guardrails than any previous agreement for classified AI deployments, including Anthropic's" (OpenAI)
items.title_zh: OpenAI 表示，其国防部协议坚持了其红线，并且“比之前任何有关机密人工智能部署的协议（包括 Anthropic 的协议）都有更多的防护措施” (OpenAI)
